engalanthaye deshapalana rakawarana apeksha karana pudgalayaku wenuwen swechchawen peni sitina shri lankawe deshapalana adhyayana pilibanda wisheshagnyabhawayak sahitha landan wishwa widyalaye kathikacharyawarayaku ihatha ki rakawarana apekshakayage nithignyawarayata upades dima pinisa thorathurak asa noboda apa wetha ewana lada, thawamath apa wisin pilithuru no sapayana lada eemel lipiyakin wimasa thibunu karunak wuye mita pasalos wasakata pamana pera jawipen bindi giya deshapalana kandayamak ese bindi yamata pera jawipe thula eks kandayama lesa peni sitiya da yannayi.

mama ampare sewayakaraddi masamupakara upakomasaris dhuraye wadabalima karaddi mayatathe samupakara samithi parikshakawarayek lesa sewaya kala ke wi nihal mahatha suwishesha charithayak.rajya sewakayeku lesa sewaya karamin sitiyada ohusathu wenama wyaparayak thibuna.ee marga prathisanskarana kirime yanthra sapayime sewawak.ampara palathe ebandu barawahana sapayime sewawe siti pradhana aayathanaya ohuta ayathwa thibuna.swaadhinawa rajakarikala daksha niladhariyeku ha mana salasum sahagathawa katayuthukala wyaparikayeku wimath nisa ohu ma samaga behewin samipawa asuru kala.mama ampara pradeshiya lekam kama karaddi atham dawasaka hawasata nihal pamina yam yam aluth adahas masamaga sakachcha karana puruddak thibuna.ek dinak nihal sakachcha kale ohuge wyaparika katayuthuwala gatalu ganayi.buldosar bako yanthra harana yanthra thalana yanthra nadaththu wiyadama pilibandawa ohu honda adhyanayak kara thibuna.ema adhyanayen ohu helikaragenathibune yanthra kriya karuwange durwalatha nisa yanthra nadaththuwata wishala piriwayak darimata siduwana bawayi.me kshesthraye yanthra kriya karuwan aluthin yedawime awashyathawa wasarakata 600kpamana wana bawath widhimath yanthra kriya karu patamalawak aththe iktad aayathanaye pamanak bawath in pitawana sankhyawa wasarakata 135-150athara bawath ohu pawasuwa.me higaya piyawima sandaha puhunu wadasatahana arambaimata honda pasubimak athath rajaye sahaya nathiwa asiru bawa ohu pawasuwa.mesandahawyapruthiyak kamkaruha wruthiya puhunu amathyanshayata yomu kirimata ma upades dunna.ohu ee illima yomu karath eegana kisidu prathicharayak labune na.
oyala aasa keti katha walatada diga katha walatada?

kiyala ahanawa,wade kiyanne wadihariyakma inne oya deweniyata kiyapu wargaye yaluwo.mul warge yaluwo bohoma aduyi,abe kiyanne mata hitapu oya mul wargaye yaluwek.podi kale game ekata sellan karapu ekata tawume klas giyapu ekata rasthiyadu gahapu hitha honda kollek wechcha abege jiwithe pasukalinawa ekama khedanthayak wuna.ee kiyanne samakalina yaluwo okkoma pahe rassawal walata yaddi abe angoda pissan kotuwata giya.ee asu gananwala mula, eda indala pahugiya awurudde sadahatama melowa harayana thuruma ohuta pissuwath ekkama jiwath wennata siduwuna.saren sare pissu hondawela gedara aawath masayak wath inna labenne na aapahu pissu thadawela ispirithale yanna wenawa.
